newsitem.title: USA: HNC Software to acquire Retek.
newsitem.headline: HNC Software to acquire Retek.

text.p: HNC Software Inc said Friday it has agreed to acquire privately held software company Retek Distribution Corp and its U.S. unit Retek Information Systems for stock valued at $47 million.

Reteck sells a client/server merchandise management system for large- and medium-sized retailers that in the last two years has won substantial market share with 40 percent of its installations outside North America, HNC said.
The software integrates with successful third-party retail solutions such as forecasting, planning, materials handling, point-of-sale and financial applications.

"Retek's reputation in the market and expertise in the retail industry will be valuable assets in the integration and marketing of HNC's SkuPLAN with the Retek product," HNC Software President Robert North said in a statement.
SkuPLAN is a neural network-based causal forecasting and forecast-driven replenishment system for retailers and consumer-goods manufacturers.
